cause.description:
This is an awareness campaign which will, i hope, feed people with the information needed to stay well away from any circumstances which could land you in some serious shit...
1. Written educational campaigns in poor remote areas is not going to get the mesage accross.
2. Visual campaigns must be started at a huge rate e.g. pictures.
3. These pictures cannot be over explicit, because little children have a chance of being exposed to disturbing images.
cause.mission: make people aware of how easy it is to get AIDS
cause.name: Anyone can get AIDS
